replies.onlyOwner:
```diff
- Are you bored? This command isn't for you! Don't touch it!```
replies.botPerm:
-# **I (the bot) don't have the necessary permissions to execute the {mention_command} command!!
Required Permissions: [{bot_perms}]**
replies.userPerm:
-# **You don't have the necessary permissions to use the {mention_command} command!!
Required Permissions: [{user_perms}]**
replies.cooldown: -# **You have been temporarily blocked from using the {mention_command} command due to excessive use. You can try again after <t:{expired_timestamp}:R>.**

ephemeral.description: Do you want this message to stay hidden?

replies.noChannelError:
```diff
- You must be connected to a voice channel.```
replies.notMatchedVoice:
```diff
- Your voice channel doesn't match mine. Please join the channel I'm in.```
replies.noPermToView:
```diff
- I can't view the channel. Please give me the 'View Channel' permission.```
replies.noPermToConnect:
```diff
- I can't connect to the channel. Please give me the 'Connect' permission.```
replies.userDeaf:
```diff
- You can't use this command while you're muted.```
replies.clientMute:
```diff
- Please unmute me first and then try again.```
replies.guildCreate: -# **I was just added to a new server, and I'm now a member of `{guilds}` servers.**
replies.guildDelete: -# **I was removed from a server. I'm still a member of `{guilds}` other servers.**
replies.webhookBug: There was an issue sending the error to the Discord webhook!!
replies.ipError: Unfortunately, your IP has been blocked by Discord. It's recommended to switch to a new IP.
replies.loginError: An error occurred. Your bot token might be incorrect, or some of your bot's permissions might be disabled :(
replies.noTokenError: You haven't entered your bot token in the config.js or .env file!!
replies.guildAlert: -# **The total number of servers I'm a member of is `{guilds}`.**
replies.databaseError: Failed to connect to the database!! (Type: {type})

setup.description: Register server settings in the database.

panel.description: Create a radio player control panel.

replies.success: AFK successfully activated in this server.
replies.doDeleteChannel: -# **To set up the panel in your desired channel, make sure to select it. The channel <#{channel}> has been set for the panel. If you want to remove it, click one of the buttons below.**
replies.noChannel:
```diff
- You must mention a text channel.```
replies.deleteChannel: Channel successfully removed from the database.

prefix.description: Set a custom prefix in the server's database.

replies.invalidUser:
This button is for {author} only, and you do not have permission to use it.
For using the buttons, it's better to call the command "{mention_command}".
replies.noPlayerError: No player has been activated in this server. Please create a player.
replies.notMatchedVoice: Your voice channel does not match with mine. Please join the channel I am in.
replies.success: Music player panel successfully registered in channel {channel}.

embed.author: Bot Help
embed.value1:
>>> Hi! I am {username}.
I am an entertainment and management bot that helps admins manage the server more easily, while also helping members to have fun and solve their issues.
embed.value2: >>> You can click the menu below this message to see all of my commands and view the commands for each section.

afk.description: Activate AFK mode for the server's voice channel.

replies.noChannelError:
```diff
- You must mention a voice channel or join one of the channels.```
replies.noPlayerError:
```diff
- No player has been activated in this server. Please create a player.```
replies.notMatchedVoice:
```diff
- Your voice channel does not match with mine. Please join the channel I am in.```
replies.success: Music player panel successfully registered in channel {channel}.

play.description: Play music in the voice channel.

replies.onlyPanel: This command can only be used in the channel <#{channel}>.
replies.invalidQuery:
-# **This station is not approved! Please select one of the stations below:**
```json
{stations}```

stop.description: Stop and remove the player in the voice channel.

volume.description: Check or change the player's volume.

options.input: Select a volume level between 0 and 200.

replies.footer: Use the '/volume <1-200>' command to change the volume.
replies.invalidInput:
```diff
- Invalid input. Please select a number between 0 and 200.```

replies.invalidStatus:
```diff
- Invalid input!
+ Correct input: status:[statusName]
+ statusName can be: [{status}]```
replies.invalidActivity:
```diff
- Invalid input!
+ Correct input: type:[typeName]
+ typeName can be: [{activity}]```
